Safe Quality Food (SQF)

Rigorous Food Safety and Quality Assurance

What is SQF?

The Safe Quality Food (SQF) Program is a rigorous and credible food safety and quality management system that is recognized by retailers, brand owners, and food service providers worldwide. Managed by the Safe Quality Food Institute (SQFI), a division of the Food Marketing Institute (FMI), SQF is designed to meet the needs of buyers and suppliers globally.

SQF certification is recognized by the Global Food Safety Initiative (GFSI) and provides a comprehensive framework for managing food safety and quality simultaneously. It goes beyond basic food safety to include quality management, making it one of the most comprehensive standards in the industry.

Shehirian's SQF Commitment

Our SQF certification represents Shehirian's dedication to producing bulgur wheat that not only meets but exceeds international food safety and quality standards. This certification validates:

  • Comprehensive Safety Systems: End-to-end food safety management from sourcing to delivery
  • Quality Excellence: Consistent product quality that our customers have trusted for over 65 years
  • Risk Management: Proactive identification and mitigation of potential hazards
  • Supply Chain Integrity: Verified traceability and transparency throughout our operations
  • Continuous Improvement: Regular assessments and enhancements to our processes

The SQF Advantage

What sets SQF apart is its dual focus on both safety and quality. While many standards focus solely on food safety, SQF ensures that products are not only safe but also meet stringent quality specifications. For Shehirian, this means:

  • Consistent grain quality and texture in every batch
  • Verified nutritional value and purity
  • Compliance with customer specifications and expectations
  • Protection of our brand reputation and family legacy

Our SQF Practices

Maintaining SQF certification requires unwavering attention to detail and operational excellence:

  • Documented food safety and quality systems
  • HACCP-based hazard analysis and control measures
  • Good Manufacturing Practices (GMPs) and prerequisite programs
  • Validated cleaning and sanitation procedures
  • Comprehensive employee training programs
  • Regular internal audits and third-party verification
  • Product testing and quality verification

From Our Family to Yours

Since 1958, the Shehirian family has been committed to producing the finest bulgur wheat. Our SQF certification ensures that this commitment is backed by world-class food safety and quality management systems. When you choose Shehirian, you're choosing a product that honors our Armenian heritage while meeting the highest modern standards.
